ISSUE.TITLE: Show warning if trying to impersonate inactive customer
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: If an customer is inactive and you try to impersonate that customer, you land on start page but without impersonating the customer. An warning that the user is inactive, and redirect back to customer in admin would be an desirable behavior.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Further changes on "Refactoring of FilePermissionHelper class"

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3238 Added warning when trying to impersonate for inactive customers
